name: Windows Gather Razer Synapse Password Extraction
author: Thomas McCarthy "smilingraccoon" <smilingraccoon@gmail.com>
Matt Howard "pasv" <themdhoward@gmail.com>
Brandon McCann "zeknox" <bmccann@accuvant.com>
description:
This module will enumerate passwords stored by the Razer Synapse
          client. The encryption key and iv is publicly known. This module
          will not only extract encrypted password but will also decrypt
          password using public key. Affects versions earlier than 1.7.15.

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
